name: Sci-Magic: The Battle of Knowledge
description:
Synopsis

In the pursuit of maximum knowledge many lose sanity and others evolve a level beyond.

Different groups are formed and for the most part, with differing opinions. How to decide who is right or wrong? Who is worthy of being the holder of the maximum title? Where is the best fusion of theory and practice?

As gentlemen, a fight must be carried out where only one side will win.
Science or Magic?

Choose your team and fight to prove your supremacy.

Only the theme of the game is focused on combat. The best way to resolve our differences is through dialogue with respect.

Our game is a "chimera" composed of the following elements:

  • Platform
  • Run'n Gun
  • Tower Defense
  • Survival training
  • PVP Combat

Supports keyboard, mouse and joystick and English language.

Upcoming Features

  • Story Mode
  • Map Maker
  • Mobile version (android)
  • More playable characters
  • New maps
  • New enemies
  • More Powerups
  • Skins
  • Online Scores (Survivor and Victories)
  • Mutiplayer Online

Share your opinion with us!
